Tips for your Webmaker event.description: Subject for the Event Created email

event_created_1.message: I'm excited to hear you're throwing an event! To help you make it a success, we've compiled some tips and tricks. These resources will help you organize your event, get the most out of our teaching materials, work with local partners, gain press coverage, gather feedback, and more.
event_created_1.description: First paragraph of the Event Created email

event_created_2.message: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me. I'm here to help!
event_created_2.description: Second paragraph of the Event Created email
